website_summaries.verdict: A very good 2.0 machine, but it is missing the temperature control and time feature of its big brothers.
pros: Streamlined, reliable, and easy to use
It can handle a carafe, too
Includes a strength control setting to determine the intensity of your brew
cons: The 2.0 restriction prevents the use of some 3rd-party K-Cups
No timer to automatically brew carafes at a set time

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Simpley the best cup of coffee and the best coffee maker we have ever owned. So easy to use our 9 year old daughter can use it. Shipping was fast, ordered it Friday night and received it Sunday morning.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Machine
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd Keurig, and after all the kerfuffle over the k pods - I'm pleased to say this machine takes them all. It is very chatty and polite and easy to use. I wish it had an auto off -- my big critique. I can't say much about the color "plum" as it's more grey and a tad boring, than the plum color I was expecting.
customer_reviews.author: CatFoodJunkie

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love it!!! It was easy to set up, coffee comes out at the perfect temperature. It's astetically pleasing and fits perfectly on my coffee drawer. The only thing I don't like/can't figure out is how to turn the screen off. It has a little power button in the bottom left hand side of the screen, but when I push it it does not turn off. So I unplugged it at night.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: After 10+ months, STILL LOVE IT!!!
customer_reviews.text: I had a plain black Keurig for about 8 years before it started acting up. I was pleasantly surprised to find there are now multiple colors to choose from! Mine arrived quickly, well-packaged, and was easy to set up. After daily use (between 1-5 cups/day) for 10+ months, it still is working perfectly! I have ZERO complaints. I like the display screen, ability to change cup sizes, brew strength and specify hot cocoa/cider for brewing. The fun color options are just icing on the cake. Easy to fill, easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: L.Smith

customer_reviews.title: I love this color
customer_reviews.text: This coffee maker works perfectly for me because I am a one cup a day single person (which means that I don't have to fill up the tank every day).I do wish I had picked one that made more than 10 oz, but realistically I probably don't need more coffee than that. It was a little bigger than I thought it would be, but that's ok too. I love this color. It's a mix of gray and purple which are my two favorite colors. Overall I have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: spie

customer_reviews.title: Don't be fooled into thinking you can make a travel size unless ypu plan to buy more expensive kcups
customer_reviews.text: Hate this product. I've had a Keurig for the last 9 yrs & when it died last week I decided to buy a new one. I had no idea to get the same mug of coffee I've gotten for the past 9 yrs I'd have to buy something called a Kmug which is a lot more expensive than the already expensive Kcups. I will be selling this scam & replacing it with something that will give me a travel mug size of coffee.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Powell

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: It's a beautiful color, very happy with my choice. Very easy to use, doesn't take up too much space and fits well in a corner on a wood tray.
customer_reviews.author: Jes

customer_reviews.title: Keurig is replacing it and that's good but such a hassle
customer_reviews.text: Received this brewer and, right out of the box, it didn't work. Keurig is replacing it and that's good but such a hassle, have to wait again for next one to be delivered and hope it works. I like the Keurig concept for sure but this is the second one with purchased with problems.
customer_reviews.author: Linda S. Sandlin

customer_reviews.title: I love this pot
customer_reviews.text: I love this pot, but it has a bad flaw--you cannot remove the water that sits inside the pot. This is a major problem, when I would like to leave this pot in my camper over winter....I cannot---because 6 cups of water is inside of it. and is not removable. The Keurig company needs to fix this problem. But I love this pot, cause you can make 8 cups in the carafe, or 1 cup, single serve--and I love the color.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly, I Love my Keurig! ☕️
customer_reviews.text: So I put off buying one of these for several reasons. One being that I think the k-cups are incredibly wasteful and not environmentally friendly. The second being that I wasn't sure it would brew a great cup of coffee. I use the filter cup and man, does this thing brew a great cup of coffee! I feel that there is very little waste involved and my morning cup is delish! Perfect for someone who doesn't need more than one (maybe two cups) in the morning☕️
customer_reviews.author: loriann

customer_reviews.title: In love with Keruig
customer_reviews.text: I received my Keruig K250 and I couldn't be happier. This is a replacement for my current one. I just wanted the red color instead of the aqua color. Never had an issue with this style. I love how easily you can remove the pieces to clean them. I received the red Kmini as a Christmas gift, but found the size to be only slightly smaller and the kcup holder could not be removed to clean. Cheaper yes, but not the same quality to me. Several families members own different Keruigs, but I'm partial to the K250. I hope Keruig doesn't discontinue this style, because I'm in love.
customer_reviews.author: JB4Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Worst thing I’ve ever bought!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Shoud have listened to the negative reviews!!! This thing has not worked correctly once!!! We are using Keurig brand k cups and we have not gotten to drink a single cup of coffee!! I just don’t understand how this thing is such a peice if junk!!!!!! Maybe I’m doing something wrong , but I don’t believe I am. You should bot have to clean the needle after the first use! I’m so annoyed and frustrated with this purchase!!!!!!!! DO NOT BUY THIS
customer_reviews.author: radford s bailes

customer_reviews.title: Former amazon junkie
customer_reviews.text: The product did not work, when I contacted Keurig they instructed me to locate the serial number so they. Old fix the problem. The sticker was nowhere to be found anywhere on the “NEW” machine so they said it’s not one of ours, sorry can’t help...Makes me wary of many of your resellers as this is the third product in a row that was not as advertised. I only going to buy in a store where I can see what I going to get..
customer_reviews.author: Bocajb

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after TWO MONTHS!!!!!! Do not buy!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy a Keurig from Amazon! I bought this product less than two months ago and it stopped working! It started spewing out coffee grinds and the coffee tastes awful! The only reason I purchased from amazon was because I really liked the teal color. My gut was to go with Costco but they don’t have the same color selections. Now we are left with a broken coffee maker, past the return date, that makes cofffee filled with grinds. I love amazon for a lot of things, but you cannot best Costco’s return policy. I’m so mad that an expensive profit would stop working less than TWO MONTHS after purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Venessa

customer_reviews.title: Saves counter space, but at a cost
customer_reviews.text: This is a good machine except for one major problem, the water tank. At 40oz It is much smaller than other models that hold 70oz. I feel like i am always putting water into this thing. It does have a smaller footprint than other models, but i would give up the space for the larger resovoir. Also the placement of the tank is awkward and the lid always has condensate and will drip on you or the counter when you remove it.
customer_reviews.author: Housttx

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY
customer_reviews.text: Loved it at first and the color, BUT it doesn’t work anymore. The touch screen doesn’t do anything. Looked it up on YouTube and found out many people have the same issue. No matter how many times I’ve tried what they said to get it to work it does not help. Also, pictures show use of a carafe with it. So, I bought the carafe, but can’t figure out how to get the water to fill a carafe instead of the smaller cups.
customer_reviews.author: MONICA

customer_reviews.title: support is poor
customer_reviews.text: Stopped brewing after 6 months and when I called a Keurig I find out from the serial number this is a 2017 model and so they will not warranty the unit,,says older than one year..'o( I purchased this last june and now dead....says to clean the nozzles, did that many, many times,,and still won’t brew,,cleaned and descaked many times...now a broken piece of crap..do not buy this one.. too many sensors and glitch in the computer chip or whatever ...
customer_reviews.author: Darby M. Hall

customer_reviews.title: Great product, but received a defective one initially
customer_reviews.text: The machine itself is great, but had to return this one because it was dysfunctional. Received he product in original packaging, but found water in the inside so I'm wondering if it had been previously returned. We set it up anyway and figured we'd just make sure it was cleaned properly before use. Once clean, we noticed that every time we made coffee, there were a lot of grounds in the cup. We tried it multiple times over the course of a few days and unfortunately it didn't get any better. We returned and purchased the same model from a different retailer and haven't had any problems with grounds.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry C Maniscalco Jr

customer_reviews.title: Perfect For My Needs
customer_reviews.text: I love this coffee maker. It's the first Keurig I've ever owned so I don't have much to compare it to. But the coffee is hot and delicious. It's as quiet as my regular previous coffee maker ever was, and it's quick. Even if you don't leave it on with the water pre-heated, it only takes a minute to pre-heat the water, then a few seconds to brew the cup. The water tank seems to be big enough so far. I've seen other machines with larger tanks that brew bigger than 10 oz cups too, so if that's important to you, keep that in mind.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Shoponline

customer_reviews.title: Great product. But we did have the plastic smell ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product. But we did have the plastic smell to start. I cleaned it with small amount of white vinegar (did not run that solution through it, just soaked and washed all of the parts with it). Worked like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: JRW

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: We have been using this Keurig for 4 months now and it's working great. Impressed with the touch-screen lighted digital display. You can program it to remind you when it needs filter replacement and de-scaling. Ours was missing the "set filter replacement date" piece that you apparently put over the filter chamber itself but it doesn't make a difference in its effectiveness (hopefully). We like the 4-10oz option setting and the "strong" and "hot chocolate or other" setting as well. It comes with two filters and one free bottle of descaling liquid. Easy to clean, easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Leanne O.

customer_reviews.title: A little larger than expected, but works great! One Suggestion...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a dorm room since it was very cute and not too expensive. The color is great but it is a bit larger than i expected (should have looked at the dimensions oops). It is very deep but is overall low profile from the front. I've had it for a week now and the only suggestion that I have is to cycle it through with water 10+ times before using it. The water smelled a little funky at first, but cycling made a big difference. Overall I am happy with this purchase and it will save boatloads of money that would have been spent on Starbucks!
customer_reviews.author: Erika Colbrunn

customer_reviews.title: Keurig 2.0
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this coffee maker. I will have to get used to the tank top being on the rear, but time will do that. I wanted a brighter red than the vintage or the rhubarb reds, and this is it. When I saw that it was a 2.0, I was afraid that it would only take Keurig pods, but it works with any brand pods. Nothing in the description said it was 2.0 and is why I went with it, but all is well. The Imperial Red is really pretty if, like me, you want a brighter red. I wanted it as close a red as possible to match my red mixer.
customer_reviews.author: Minnie S. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Don’t
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy ANY 2.0 Keurigs because they no longer sell the Karafe size cups. You can use regular k-cups and personal coffee- but you can’t buy k-Karafes (except from weird expensive 3rd parties). Also, you still need to buy a separate karafe in order to get large coffee. It won’t brew without special magnetic pot.
customer_reviews.author: mommy mary

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS MODEL KEURIG
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to final upgrade from my magic chef single cup coffee maker. I decided on this one for the size and look. I should have believed the reviews! When i did all the steps to get it ready for use, i tried it to make hot water and it did a good job. I decided to try a cup of the included coffee pods. It works awesome! I was super pumped. Getting ready for work, going about my morning, i'm ready to make my coffee and go. I see this error message. I'm sending it back. Literally just delivered yesterday.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Bronson

customer_reviews.title: The Right Color - Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Great product for k-cups and it was the color I wanted for my kitchen instead of the typical black ones found at my local retail stores. This is my second k-cup maker. I didn't realize, however, that you have to buy certified Keurig k-cups only to use with this brewer model. Of course, there are workarounds for this problem that can be found on the web. Keurig should re-think this as many people love to buy variety k-cup packs from coffee bean companies all over the world, as I do. The problem didn't keep me from using the coffeemaker, it was just an annoyance that was easily remedied.
customer_reviews.author: C. GerberTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Get one now! This is the 2.0 brew system.
customer_reviews.text: I don't know why we waited so long to get our first Keurig. I guess we thought it was a fad and we'd just keep making coffee in our Mr Coffee. Problem was we always made a full 12 cup and drink only half. So we'd waste 6 cups almost daily. The Keurig solves this. Now we just use what we drink. The wait time is less then brewing a pot also. Weve spent the last week trying all the different flavors. We really do love it. Also this is the 2.0 that people were asking about. I submitted a pic.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Andrew Board

customer_reviews.title: Very nice machine worth the upgrade
customer_reviews.text: This machine is very nice and I can keep using my k-cups. I hope this machine lasts as long as my old Keurig. It looks better than my old machine, I don't know if it's just me but I think it brews faster. I can't test it since my old machine broke hence my purchase of this one. If you do not own a Keurig and you're in the market then you need to click that buy now button you won't regret it. If you own an old Keurig that is giving you trouble, leaking, getting clogged, etc. Upgrade already.
customer_reviews.author: S. Q.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I like the look of this Keurig coffee maker, although I confess it is a little bigger than I thought it would be. Love the color, though, so I don't mind having it on my kitchen counter. (Normally, I don't like a lot of stuff sitting on the counters.) Anyway, it works great and I like the fact that I can serve company exactly what they want without wasting half a pot of coffee because someone wants decaf. I even find myself drinking more coffee (I am more a tea drinker) but I have also used it for hot chocolate, so the versatility is great!
customer_reviews.author: AMB

customer_reviews.title: Do not reccomend
customer_reviews.text: Had my original Keurig for several years, finally gave out. Order this one thinking. It was a nice color and took up less space. The water reservoir is so small, that you are continually adding water. It is also located on the back of the machine, having to pull it out from under the counter every time. The needle has had to be cleaned multiple times already, constant messages it always needs something. Not at all happy :-(
customer_reviews.author: machine

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: It's so much superior to older coffee makers. We love ours and the color is so pretty. Be certain to get the correct size cups or you have to trick the machine by taking the foil off of the new pods and using that to cover the outdated pods and trick the machine to brew. The color is gorgeous and it's touch screen.
customer_reviews.author: LaurasGreenEyes

customer_reviews.title: NOT HOT ENOUGH
customer_reviews.text: This is my first Keurig machine that my husband bought me Christmas. I have not had any problems making coca or coffee. My only problem is it is not one stop as I have to heat my drink each time. DEFINITELY NOT HOY ENOUGH. I am thinking of going into settings and selecting the “thin air” heating. I am hoping it will heat longer if the machine believes I live on top of a mountain. Otherwise, I’m stuck with the microwave for extra heat. Keurig should allow a heating default setting.
customer_reviews.author: Marlene Beach

customer_reviews.title: Just ok. Wish I would of went with the ...
customer_reviews.text: Just ok. Wish I would of went with the cheaper one. This one is very picky and won’t use a pod unless it is Keurig. Seems to take longer to warm up then my last cheaper one. Also the water container is smaller.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy

customer_reviews.title: Color Expectations
customer_reviews.text: Our Keurig Vue quit on us and we new we wanted another Keurig, but something a little smaller. We fell in love with the color options K250 had to offer. We opted for the Sandy Pearl color and we are slightly disappointed in the color. It's more of a flat color with no sparkle/pearl effect. The other challenge is refilling the water tank as it's in the back of the unit and the machine is tucked in under a cabinet. Beside those two issues we are very happy with this new machine. *Hint to power it down...hold the power button for a few sec and the screen with shut off.*
customer_reviews.author: Samantha B

customer_reviews.title: Simple, easy, and perfect for a quick hot drink
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. We were looking for something simple to use for just the two of us. We have owned many different models of Keurig but now that it is only my husband and I, we do not need a ton of buttons to push. This has three cup sizes, 6,8, and 10 ounce. Chose your mug size and press the start button. Love the fresh brewed coffee without putting much thought into it.
customer_reviews.author: R. L.

customer_reviews.title: Was missing a piece
customer_reviews.text: It was missing a piece but luckily I saved all the pieces from my previous K250 so I had the piece and it wasn’t an issue. Still it’s weird that it was supposedly a brand new coffee maker and was missing a piece. Other than that, no complaints. I bought this because it is a now-discontinued model that I had for years and I used it until it died. Was glad to find one on Amazon since Keurig doesn’t make this one anymore.
customer_reviews.author: HeartRN13

customer_reviews.title: I am hoping this one is a better model and will last longer
customer_reviews.text: Well, I have had past Keurig machines have early failures with various sealed system, pump failures so there is no real way to repair them. I am hoping this one is a better model and will last longer. But for a few dollars more, I took out the Amazon insurance. So, we shall see!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this machine
customer_reviews.text: I love this machine. It is easy and quick in the morning, and Keurig’s customer service cannot be beat. I have used the cups, but prefer the reusable cup. Most of my travel mugs do not fit in it, but for some I just slide the piece that the mug sits on out and they usually fit then.
customer_reviews.author: AMR

customer_reviews.title: Godd coffee but piece of plastic.
customer_reviews.text: It makes great coffee but it is a piece of plastic. Mine keeps showing a message on screen, even if I do the Needle Maintenance several times, it won't work. Hot water for tea keeps coming out dirty. Bought it 3 months ago. Only brewed 15-20 cups.
customer_reviews.author: Pedro Nova

customer_reviews.title: Product breaks after only 1 year of use
customer_reviews.text: This machine lasted for only about a year. I purchased in late 2017 and by June 2019 coffee began leaking out and staining my counter top. I called the phone number provided on the order, they offered to replace the unit at a discounted price of $109...I did not accept and will not purchase this again as apparently you'll only get a year of life out of it. I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: B N

customer_reviews.title: Worked great, started leaking after 7 months.
customer_reviews.text: I've loved this model, it works great... Until after 7 months it started leaking water. See video - it's from somewhere inside the machine. Now I have to deal with the mfgr - which is more hassle and time than just buying a new one... Frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Joey

customer_reviews.title: Its goid but...
customer_reviews.text: I got the teal color its beautiful! Coffee taste is good,Cleaning it is easy but the only thing where is a deal breaker is that its always running out of water and is constantly asking it to be refilled after two cups of coffee so i ended up going back to my regular coffee machine .
customer_reviews.author: M.S.

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Order came quick. All items included are just as described. Was an easy set up. I’ve used other model keurigs before but this is my first for this model. The color is great and fits perfect on top of rolling drawer. Did not give full 5 stars because this is first day using just after delivery, but from experience from other model keurigs, this should not disappoint as long as used as directed & maintain properly.
customer_reviews.author: Jennie N

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and fast!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very sleek and space-saving model of the Keurig, it's beautiful in my kitchen, particularly in the Oasis color. I love having immediate coffee every morning! The only downside, which will forever baffle me, is that the largest cup size is 10 oz. Who on earth drinks a cup of coffee that small? Granted, I can buy a carafe, but I don't want quite that much coffee either... all Keurig models should have a 12 or 14 oz option for a cup.
customer_reviews.author: M. Swenson

customer_reviews.title: The Little Keurig that Can
customer_reviews.text: I admit I bought this for color but it has exceeded my expectations. I am a two cup a day and my son is too. It has never failed us although we are the family more likely to test any product to the death. Great flavor for a little coffeemaker and has a feature for strong coffee that really works. Make sure you buy extra filters, cheap and filter your water for taste!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Damaged box and items missing.
customer_reviews.text: We recived our keurig today and when I pulled it out of the bok it was delivered in the box was damaged almost as if it was opened. I also did not get the items that it said were included in the box. This is disappointing for my first experience with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Not so happy!
customer_reviews.text: Not particularly happy with this product. I can only get about 2/3 of a cUp of coffee, and to do that I have to press the 10oz button. 8oz is just 1/2 a cup! Is there a way to get a full cup that really is 10ozs???
customer_reviews.author: Sheila K. Ames

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 2 weeks
customer_reviews.text: First review on Amazon. Replaced an older broken keurig with this one. After two weeks I started getting this error "k cup not for use with this brewer" even though there was no k cup in the machine. Customer support wasn't helpful. I'll probably go for a refund rather than replace. Or bite the cost and take it out back and use it for target practice. Would probably be more satisfying. Hope this helps you decision...
customer_reviews.author: Jack W.

customer_reviews.title: It's a Keurig, so there.
customer_reviews.text: At first, I thought it was broken because I couldn't turn it on. I was following the instructions, and I was familiar with Keurigs at the office. This was an upscale model, so I didn't realize that even though it has this big button on it, I actually had to touch the screen to turn it on. It serves me well for tea pods, coffee pods, or hot water. Love it! Great color, too. The color is more vibrant than the dull picture, partly because it's a glossy finish rather than a dull finish.
customer_reviews.author: M. D. Minuth

customer_reviews.title: Great product - with one irksome flaw
customer_reviews.text: Plenty has been written about the quality of these coffee machines - and for that I give the product 5 stars. But there is one pet peeve that I have against the product and that is that it will just not work with some K-cups. In particular the San Francisco brand is a great coffee but their K-cups will not work in this K250 - the coffee maker senses something with the K-cup and refuses to proceed. I get the argument that the machine is protecting itself and the user - but there is no threat with either with the aforementioned K-cups.
customer_reviews.author: J. Aceti

customer_reviews.title: Granules in coffee!
customer_reviews.text: Granules in my first cup of coffee, did the maintenance as per instructions before use and even cleaned again just in case I missed something, but still have granules in the coffee. They also sent me the wrong color, but I had to keep it due to shipping back being too much hassle. Still, even in the wrong color, I expected the machine to work really well due to it's name's reputation. Not what I expected for a Keurig.
customer_reviews.author: LV Foster

customer_reviews.title: So far I've loved it.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Keurig as my 1st one went into my Rv. I couldn't decide which one to get and saw some not so good reviews on this one but decided to take a chance. The price was good and decided to purchase the extra warranty in case i have issues like others did. It isnt noisy like some people mentioned, it doesnt take forever to heat up either. Brewed my 1st cup this morning and was nice and hot maybe not as hot as my other one but used a Yeti and it stayed warm. If anything changes i will post
customer_reviews.author: MICHELLE ROSAS

customer_reviews.title: Works well but is larger than it appears in photo.
customer_reviews.text: It works well and does what it is supposed to do. The coffee maker appears smaller than it is in the photo. It is actually as big as my regular coffee maker and I was expecting it to be smaller. The choices of cup size are too limited. The large cup show in the photo would require you to run it twice to get a full cup. The largest size you can select is 10 oz. I am satisfied with it for now but it is not what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: pat burg

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I had this for a year & a half. I stopped drinking coffee for 9 months & stored it away clean & clean space. When I went o use it again the water comes out brown. I’ve used the solution to clean it & everything else from Keurig. Nothing seems to work. Definitely disappointed that it’s not functioning like I thought it would. Any suggestions would be fantastic
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I love this Keurig! It's so easy to use and it works perfectly for our little office of five. You have to fill up the water a couple times a day if people have multiple cups of coffee, but other than that it's great. We've all saved so much money by not going to SB or Peet's and just by making coffee at work with the Keurig. The cream color is super nice too - I was going to get black because it was cheaper, but since they were out of stock, I got the cream colored one and I am not disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Really upset that it’s not working properly
customer_reviews.text: I strongly suggest reading the reviews carefully before choosing which Keurig to buy. I just received this one today and it’s stuck on this screen even though the shipping disc was removed. I tried looking online for answers, but there is nothing that can be done except getting a new one. I will not purchase this model of Keurig again.
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: Slow.. Takes forever.. Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Very Disappointed... I replaced my no frills keurig with this one... It takes forever to heat up.. You have to keep messing with the handle up and down.. It's a complete waste of money... Major let down... I'm probably going back to my old one.. This one literally sucks!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Corina D.

customer_reviews.title: The product support is even worse as now
customer_reviews.text: Awful product. Never has worked. Bought for my basement and when family went to use it, it keeps saying "more water please." No fix will work. The product support is even worse as now, 3 months later, its ineligible for a return or support. Buyer beware...
customer_reviews.author: Scott Davidson

customer_reviews.title: Make sure the digital works!
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy my coffee and was due for a new Keurig! I ordered the 2.5 series! It came and I was able to make a good cup of coffee, however, the technical part was acting up on the digital screen! I decided to keep rather then return, however, I had to figure out a way to remove the used Kcup without the screen going to a different function! So now it turned by easy steps of coffee making into a race with time before the function turns! I feel because of that I give it A 3 rating! A little disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: Debra McGarry

customer_reviews.title: They may have upgraded the look of the machine but they downgraded the rest.
customer_reviews.text: My old keurig just died after 2 years and so I was excited to upgrade. However, since getting this I am nothing but disappointed. I miss my old one! I hate how the water container is put into this one. Much harder to get in. It randomly has a water pressure error and spills coffee grounds into my cup and all over the machine. It takes longer to heat up and is noisier than the old one. The only thing I like about it is the peacock blue color. I am very unhappy with everything else about this machine and will be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Bridget Rogman

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Frequent errors during brewing. 1/5th of brews has lots of coffee grounds in it. The unshaped tank on the back is inconvenient and awkward. We had a “lower-end” model previously that worked much more reliably and consistent. This has been a diassapointment.
customer_reviews.author: JD-BoilerUp

customer_reviews.title: Was good, until today!
customer_reviews.text: follow up. It died this AM. Did a good job until now. Kinda defeats the purpose of having one of these if you have to go through all sorts of gyrations to make a cup of coffee. Yes it will restart, after unplugging, removing reservoir and waiting for some unspecified period of time. No more Keurigs', gonna try Cuisinart next. Wish me luck.
customer_reviews.author: Ernest Stevick

customer_reviews.title: Discontinued Model but I still love it!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this coffee maker!! It is fast and extremely easy to use. I like it so well that I bought another just like it as a Christmas gift for one of my grandsons. You should be aware, however, that this model is no longer manufactured by Keurig and the seller has removed the Model number from the machine so if there is a problem, Keurig can't help you.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Sue

customer_reviews.title: Dead after 2 years.
customer_reviews.text: This was a great Keurig, but sadly didnt last even close to the length of time as my last one. After about 2 years it is no longer working properly. Will not heat up after making a cup, unless you wait for 15 - 30 minutes, the amount of water it dispenses is no longer accurate either. Time to back to the v1.0 I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Jac

customer_reviews.title: K250 '"Sandy Pearl"
customer_reviews.text: This is my third Keurig. The first one I handed down to my stepson for his Fire house. The second actually died. I didn't buy another for a while because I was getting my coffee when I got to work. I eventually decided I need it when I get up so I bought this one. I liked that I can make a carafe when I have company. This color (Sandy Pearl) is not "Pearly" as I expected. Basic beige. But it still looks good in my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Chelle

customer_reviews.title: It's Junk
customer_reviews.text: Made 3 cups of coffee with this then gave me warnings saying a needed to perform '"needle maintenance". What the actual F? Called customer service they said I needed to provide a serial number. Found the model number but couldn't locate a serial number. Very disappointed. Don't buy.
customer_reviews.author: ChargerFan

customer_reviews.title: Our previous keurig died so we picked this. It ...
customer_reviews.text: Our previous keurig died so we picked this. It has a "carafe" option which we may try. It is very different than our previous version so I'm still getting used to it. No complaints I guess I need to read the directions on it. Not sure if there is an auto on/off feature
customer_reviews.author: mary

customer_reviews.title: impossible to clean
customer_reviews.text: This is the most ridiculously over engineered thing ever. Water stays inside no matter what. If you don't use it for a week scum grows inside. If you move in winter, water freezes inside. Every single part is absurdly complex and impossible to clean. Grounds get in almost every cup. Grounds get stuck behind some tab inside that is also impossible to clean. This is just stupid and way overly complex in design for no reason. Buy something else. This replaced a Mr. Coffee brand K-Cup maker... I'd buy a Mr. Coffee brand again.
customer_reviews.author: William B.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! I'm very happy with this, I like that it does hot chocolate and strong brew separately my only issue is that it has no auto off feature, you'd figure for the price it would.
customer_reviews.author: Paix

customer_reviews.title: The brew time and the coffee are wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this coffee maker when my old one began to leak something awful. I bought this brand for it's reputation of quality and, honestly, the color along with the price. The Keurig makes a terrific cup of coffee, is easy to fill and use. It is very flexible in the amount of coffee for each cup. I have to say this is one of my best coffee maker purchases ever!
customer_reviews.author: Fred Jones

customer_reviews.title: Easy and quick to use  however not the most reliable.
customer_reviews.text: I love this Keurig because it’s a little smaller than my previous 2.0 but my previous 2.0 also had a lot of extra functions and held more water. I don’t like having to fill this up twice a day. It’s starting to make noise already and that’s because the delivery man dropped it in walking up to the house. I want to make note of this in case this thing breaks down anytime soon. I wish to have a smaller spare to use in emergencies.
customer_reviews.author: Dona Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Keurig Coffee Maker
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the unit. The only thing I did not like was that you have to load it with water from the rear. Where I have it placed it takes a bit more effort. Great coffee, No problems with the unit.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Dimaio

customer_reviews.title: Like this one better than the newer model.
customer_reviews.text: This older style Keurig K250 Coffee Maker allows me to use a coffee insert for adding my own coffee and larger cup sizes. Parts are removable for cleaning. Still not the easiest to clean however when the newer style was visually inspected (and manually wiggled) I could not see how the small plastic pod holder could be removed for internal cleaning. Knowing how dirty the Keurig K250 can get (2nd one I have owned) I opted to buy this one in advance of my 1st one going on the fritz (which it will eventually do) as it appeared they will be phasing out this model.
customer_reviews.author: RJRADAR

customer_reviews.title: Love my Keurig!
customer_reviews.text: I have used Keurig products for years and this one does not disappoint! For the price, it is great! It does not have some of the deluxe options like the more expensive ones (cannot set temperature and it only will brew up to 10oz with the regular-sized k-cups), but overall I really love this thing. We have had it for almost a year now and it is holding up great! I also love that it is more compact than other models, although you do lose a little bit of volume in the water reservoir, I feel like it is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Ross

customer_reviews.title: Item was passed off as 250 and was 200 instead
customer_reviews.text: I tried to register the machine with Keurig and discovered there was no SN# any where on the machine. I got to looking closer and discovered the machine I ordered, 250 model was actually a 200 model that was discontinued. The machine did come in a 250 model box. All the paper work was for a 200. Hum????
customer_reviews.author: Thomas E. Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Get a Clip
customer_reviews.text: I love this coffee maker. The color is great, and the quality is good. The only thing I don't like is that it will not allow you to use pods from any company; they must all come from Keurig. I ended up buying the freedom clip to work around that issue. Since then, I have had no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda M

customer_reviews.title: Brews nicely
customer_reviews.text: One of the many best gifts my husband has given me. I've had it for 8 days now and used it at least once every day. I enjoy having my fresh cup every morning. I like the touch screen feature for setting the amount you want brewed. It doesn't allow any brewing to begin if water level is below the minimum line. I've used it for coffee, hot chocolates, and chai lattes. All of which brew well.
customer_reviews.author: none

customer_reviews.title: I love the color of the keurig
customer_reviews.text: I love the color of the keurig! Although the material that's it's made of, unfortunately looks cheap. The machine comes with a water filter system to purify the water. It comes with one water filter, which is nice. The most amount of coffee it can make in one serving is 10 ounces(it also has the option of 8 oz). I would liked it to have been at least 12oz (one cup). Overall, I am enjoying my new keurig😉
customer_reviews.author: Sean P.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: works great----wish had greater water capacity ----have to continually fill. Don M
customer_reviews.author: Donald M Marchetti

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt get hot enough.
customer_reviews.text: This filters coffee well and it's nice to get a pot of coffee. However the water never gets hot enough so I have to boil water first before putting it in the coffee maker. Defeats the purpose of a one step coffee maker. 😏
customer_reviews.author: Kerry

customer_reviews.title: Defective Model Line.
customer_reviews.text: After 4 month of use this model has a non responsive LCD screen. Keurig only offered replacement item with limited brew size capability. The offered model I consider a downgrade. If you buy this get a warranty as Keurig will not offer money back or credit towards a better comparable model.
customer_reviews.author: Anon6901

customer_reviews.title: Only worked for 10 weeks
customer_reviews.text: It was fine for 9 weeks. Than the screen would not let me choose my size. So I had to mess with it to get it to work. Today it will not even let me warm the water . So basically the computer went out. Guess this will have to be tossed and I will buy the more expensive model.
customer_reviews.author: Suzmac

customer_reviews.title: Does not last.
customer_reviews.text: It died after 10 months. Completely flooded my counter. I only brew 1 cup in the morning and hot water for tea I’m the evening. Went in the trash, I’ll try a brand other than keurig for my next coffee pot.
customer_reviews.author: S. Buss

customer_reviews.title: I have wasted so much time on trying to get this product ...
customer_reviews.text: I have wasted so much time on trying to get this product to work. I have set it up correctly and when i go to use it all it keeps telling me is...preheating and then to lift handle. Once i do that and it says to place the handle down I do so and it starts all over again. I wasted 30 minutes this morning just trying to have a cup of coffee. I'll be waiting to hear a response on trying to fix the issue today and if not I will be returning this item.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money on this sun
customer_reviews.text: This thing did not work from the day I got it and by one month later it leaked so bad every time I used it the entire container of water would empty out it is being returned. It is flimsy and not made very well either
customer_reviews.author: Debra S

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working within 2 weeks
customer_reviews.text: I have owned this for a couple of weeks and I am returning it because the unit stopped working. Cheaply made in comparison to my old Keurig. I just returned another brand that didn't work right out if the box. Does anyone make a decent brewer anymore?
customer_reviews.author: JayBee

customer_reviews.title: No messing with Coffee Grounds
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with my new Keurig. I like that it tells me when I need to add more water and when it is time to clean it. This product is great for making a quick cup of coffee and no messy coffee grounds. I also like that I don't have to worry abut coffee grounds getting into my cup. I hate taking a drink of coffee and having a mouth full of grounds. This is one of the best products on the market today for making coffee. I would recommend this product to all my friends and family, it is great.
customer_reviews.author: Not me

customer_reviews.title: OUTSTANDING UNIT
customer_reviews.text: This is a replacement for my same type of unit that was over three years old. Working great and I am loving it everyday/morning. No issues since it's the same I don't have to learn new menu buttons. It came with nice extras too. Great price for a great unit.
customer_reviews.author: Robert E

customer_reviews.title: doesn't last
customer_reviews.text: For a year it worked well. Then it stopped and gave a phone number instead of an error message. The support said we need to simply throw it out and buy another. No possible way we can afford another so if you buy this figure it will last a year, then go in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: DBR

customer_reviews.title: Ordered this to replace my 10 year old Mini. ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this to replace my 10 year old Mini. When I was setting it up, the unit wouldn’t recognize that there was water in the reservoir. I called Keurig customer service and they said that my tap water must be too pure (?) in my area and the unit isn’t reading it. I would have to use bottled water instead, which isn’t feasible. I find it extremely hard to believe that my unfiltered tap water is more pure than bottled water, but left with no option, I’m returning the unit and will go with another brand. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: EC

customer_reviews.title: Buy this!!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this little guy! My husband and our boys love it as well. We can make coffee, lattes, hot chocolate etc. Wish I would have bought one sooner! I haven't had any of the problems others mentioned and I malfunction technology lol makes our mornings a breeze and will be amazing for hot cocoa of cool autumn nights.
customer_reviews.author: S.Ivey

customer_reviews.title: WORST Keurig I've ever owned!
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst Keurig I've ever owned! A "Brew Interrupted" message constantly comes up on the screen--even after I have used the little pod that was included to clean the needle. I've never had to clean a needle before, and now I have to do it twice a week to not have the brew interrupted or grounds in my coffee! I am torn between trying to find a better brewer or going back to a regular coffee maker!
customer_reviews.author: Angela Pardo

customer_reviews.title: Plastic taste and odor!!!!
customer_reviews.text: No matter how many times I washed and rinsed and vinegar treated the coffee maker, there remained a very pronounced plastic taste and smell to the output water / coffee. I see online that many have experienced the same problem. After six cycles the smell remains....one person said I haven’t cycled it enough...in my view, I shouldn’t have to do it more than once when it’s brand new.....returned for full credit...thank you Amazon Prime!
customer_reviews.author: C.M.W.

customer_reviews.title: Finally Found the One!
customer_reviews.text: I tried 4 pod coffee makers before this one. This checks all the boxes for me: smaller footprint, stores water, travel mugs fit under the dispenser, it doesn't make a big, drippy mess, makes a good, hot cup of coffee....I love it! Update: Almost a year later....still loving this Keurig! All PROS no CONS.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use! and on my eyes!
customer_reviews.text: I really like that the color goes with my kitchen; however it is such an ordeal to make every cup, add water etc., I thought it would be cool, however I see waste and not enough recycle things. I also get coffee grounds in my coffee and not sure on why, because making a pot of coffee I rarely had any! Disappointed to say the least.
customer_reviews.author: griffin

customer_reviews.title: Works great for the first month
customer_reviews.text: Absolute pile of junk. Works great for the first month, then it has issues several times a week after that. Always getting clogged, jammed, plugged, packed, whatever... I finally had enough of the hunk of crap today and unplugged it and boxed it up for a return. It ain't worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Fab

customer_reviews.title: Water Pressure error POS
customer_reviews.text: This thing sucked! I got it all setup according to the directions no problem. Went to brew a cup of coffee and got a "water pressure" error. Went through the directions to reset it and the same thing happened!!! So frustrating. I returned it right away.
customer_reviews.author: MN Lakes Girl

customer_reviews.title: What's not to like about that
customer_reviews.text: Have had it about a month now. I use filtered water in the reservoir and haven't had any of the issues some of the other reviewers have complained about. Overall, a solid and sleek product that just helped me streamline my morning routine even more. What's not to like about that?
customer_reviews.author: STT

customer_reviews.title: Dead within 1 month
customer_reviews.text: Apparently I missed the return window, but this machine didn't last us a month. Called Keurig and they discontinued this model (probably for this reason). Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: P.J. Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Love this machine features
customer_reviews.text: I love the features of the model, my last one corroded thru the main tank. This was exactly what I wanted, but I do have to say the package had been tampered with, the cleaning solution and pods were missing from the box, but I got the machine I wanted
customer_reviews.author: scubaman929

product_meta.title: Keurig K250 Coffee Maker, Single Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Brewer, With Strength Control, Black
product_meta.description: Color:BlackA Slim and Sleek Keurig Single Serve Coffee Maker, the Keurig K250 brews a rich, smooth, and delicious cup every time with the quality you expect from Keurig. With a strength control setting for a bolder brew, and multiple K-Cup, K-Mug, and K-Carafe pod brew sizes, you can customize your settings to get your perfect cup. Plus, an easy-to-use touch screen makes your brewing experience stress free. Whether you like your coffee strong, mild, decaf, or flavored, you can brew all of your favorites with the Keurig K250 – and with large 48oz water reservoir, you can brew 6+ cups before having to refill. Discover hundreds of K-Cup pod varieties from all of the brands you love, including Green Mountain Coffee, Starbucks, and Lipton, and enjoy coffee, tea, hot cocoa and more. Available in a variety of fun colors to complement any décor, and also compatible with the Keurig Plus Series My K-Cup Reusable Coffee Filter, so you can brew your own ground coffee. Please note that K250 and K250 Plus are the same.
feature_bullets: What's in the box: 4 k cup pods, a water filter handle + 2 water filters, and a bottle of descaling solution to help extend the life of your brewer
40 ounce water reservoir: Allows you to brew 4+ cups before having to refill, saving you time and simplifying your morning routine; The water reservoir is removable, making it easy to refill
Multiple k cup pod brew sizes: (4, 6, 8, 10 ounce) and brews a carafe (22, 26, or 30 ounce) using k carafe pods to give you more coffee when you need it (carafe sold separately)
Strength control: a strength control setting allows you to brew a bolder cup using any k cup pod brew size.
Black & white touch screen: makes it easy to brew a fresh, great tasting cup in under a minute.

Dispense hot water: only by opening and closing the brewer handle (without a pod), and selecting your desired brew size. A removable drip tray at the base of the brewer catches drips and makes for easy clean up. Care and cleaning: dishwasher safe parts, wipe clean
2inches touch display screen. Dimensions (in inches) : 13.7 h x 9 w x 15 d
A sleek and slim single-serve coffee maker. Includes 4 k-cup pods, a water filter handle + 2 water filters, and a bottle of descaling solution to help extend the life of your brewer.
40oz water reservoir: allows you to brew 4+ cups before having to refill, saving you time and simplifying your morning routine. The water reservoir is removable, making it easy to refill.
Multiple k-cup pod brew sizes: (4, 6, 8, 10 oz.) and brews a carafe (22, 26, or 30oz) using k-carafe pods to give you more coffee when you need it. (carafe sold separately)
Strength control: a strength control setting allows you to brew a bolder cup using any k-cup pod brew size.
Black & white touch screen: makes it easy to brew a fresh, great tasting cup in under a minute.

Dispense hot water: only by opening and closing the brewer handle (without a pod), and selecting your desired brew size. A removable drip tray at the base of the brewer catches drips and makes for easy clean-up.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars2,615 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
